sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { ProgressBar } from "../../../components/ReactElement/ProgressBar" import { LabelSelect } from "../../../components/ReactElement/InputCombo" import { ColorBtn } from "../../../components/ReactElement/ColorBtn" import { MealStatementLabel,MealTimeLabel } from "./PutLabel" import { MealTimeGroup } from "../../../components/ReactElement/InputCombo" import "../../../styles/Put/sitting.css" import { ChangeWorld } from "./LabelFunction" let TitleName = ["店家編號", "店家", "商店編號", "商品名稱", "預定", "現場", "操作"]; let Title2Name=["","主機","商品編號","商品名稱","售價","星期","指定日期","狀態","操作"]; export function PutSitting() { localStorage.setItem("LabelTitleCost", TitleName.length, 60000) //製造表單標題格數 localStorage.setItem("LabelTitleCost2", Title2Name.length, 60000) //製造表單標題格數 if (localStorage.MaxPageValue === undefined) { localStorage.setItem("MaxPageValue", 10, 60000) } localStorage.setItem("LabelCotentCost", localStorage.MaxPageValue, 60000) //製造表單欄位格數 useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { ChangeWorld(); }, 100); }); return <>

供餐時間：2020/07/02 11:00~11:30

至10:00前可回上一步重新設定現場餐點，確認日期、時段、品項，即可列印備餐。請在hh：mm前完成結單動作，逾時將取消訂單並通知消費者。
}
